betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Choosing different cards will have different effects, the following are the different effects: 

 Card Effects (Consuming Inspiration): 

 Experimentation (1) - Gain 15~30% Completion in one random subject, and 1~10% Completion in Fundamentals. 

Analysis* (2) - Exchange 1 Observational Research point for 25~50% completion in that subject, another subject gains 5% completion. 

 Abandon (0) - Keeps the existing completion in a subject and does not draw any cards about that subject, and gains 5% completion in Basic Studies. 

Reflection (-1) - Loses a total of 10% completion in all subjects equally, Basic Studies gains 1 to 10% completion, and the player gains 1 Inspiration and an additional card draw. 

Contemplation* (2) - All subjects lose an average of 25% completion, Basic Studies gain 5% completion, and the player gains an additional card draw. 

Note (1) - Lose all completion in one subject and transfer 50-100% of the lost completion to another subject. 

Inspiration (2) - The subject with the highest current completion gains 10% + current completion/2 completion. 

Research (1) - A subject receives 15-25% completion. 

Universal Theory (1) - Distributes all existing completions evenly across all subjects, with Foundation Studies gaining 5% completion and one additional subject receiving the full amount of completion. 

Research Treasures (1)- Consume 1 treasure, Basic Studies and one random subject gain 5% completion, the corresponding subject of the treasure gains 25~35% completion (if the treasure is a Blood Ritual, Cultic Studies gains 15~20%, and Occult Studies gains 10~15%). 

Research Enchantment (1) - Consumes 5 levels of experience and gains 15~20 completion points each in Arcane Infusion and Occultism. 

Aura Role (-2) - The player gains 2 Inspiration as well as an extra chance to draw a card, an extra subject will gain full completion. 

The Study of Celestial Signs (1) - By consuming two Celestial Notes, the subject with the highest level of current completion will gain 25~50% completion, and different types of notes will have different special effects. 

 [Day: one additional subject will gain full completion. Month: Gain an extra chance to draw cards. Star: Gain 0~10% completion in Evil Science, as well as up to 5 points of Temporary Twist.] 

 Concentration (1) - Gain 15% Alchemy Completion and one additional card draw, 33% chance of gaining 1 Inspiration. 

Reaction (1) - Gain 25% Alchemy Completion and a 33% chance to gain 1 Inspiration. 

Synthesis (1) - Synthesize two fragments into the one corresponding to the combination element, gaining 40% Alchemy Completion and a 33% chance to gain 1 Inspiration. 

Measurement (1) - Gain 15% Arcane Infusion Completion and an additional card draw. 

Infusion Experiment (1) - Consume Item X and Source Mass Ampoule to gain 10+1.5*√(Item X Total Source Mass Content)% Arcane Infusion Completion. 

 Guidance (1) - Gain 25% Arcane Infusion completion. 

Calibration (1) - Gain 15% Alchemy Completion and an additional card draw. 

Adjustment (1) - Gain 3*√(total source quality content of item) ~ 3*√(total source quality content of item) + 10 % Alchemical Completion. 

Consciousness Transcends Matter (1) - Consume item X and gain 10 + √ (total source quality content of item X) % alchemical completion. 

Binding Spells (1) - Lose up to 5 levels of experience and gain 5% Occult Completion for each level lost. 

Cognizance (1) - Gain 20% Occult Completion, 33% chance of gaining 1~5% Cultic Completion and 1 point of Normal Twist. 

Total Concentration (1) - Gain 15% Occultism completion and an additional card draw. 

Sculpture (1) - Consume 1 Clay Orb to gain 20% Golemology completion and one additional card draw. 

Scripting (1) - Consume 1 sheet of paper and 1 point of ink to gain 25% Puppetry completion. 

Synergy (1) - Lose a total of 15% completion in Alchemy, Alchemy and Arcane Infusion on average and gain 30% completion in Puppetry. One additional subject will gain the full amount of completion. 

Dark Whispers (1) - Consume all of the player's experience levels to gain 0.2*level~0.5*level % completion in Evil Science, the player gains √(level) points of Normal Twisting, a 50% chance of √(level) % completion in Random Subjects, and a 50% chance of an additional card draw. 

Research Sculpture (1) - Gain 10 to 20% Evil Science Completion, 10 to 20% Random Subject Completion, and the player gains 5 points of Temporary Distortion. 

Epiphany (1) - Gain 15% Evil Science completion, 5~10% completion in each of the two random subjects, the player gains 5 points of Temporary Twist, 50% chance the player gains 1 point of Normal Twist. 

Revelation (1) - Gain 30% Evil Science completion and 5~10% completion in a random subject, player gains 5 points of Temporary Distortion and 1 point of Normal Distortion. 

Seeking Truth (1) - Gain 10~25% Evil Science Completion and an additional card draw, the player gains 3 points of Temporary Distortion. 

Otherworldly Echoes (-1) - Gain 5~10% completion in Evilology and two random subjects each, gain 1 Inspiration and 2 additional card draws, and the player gains 5 points of Temporary Distortion and 1 point of Normal Distortion. 

Gain Inspiration (-1) - 
10 to 35 points of branching progress on the first choice, one point of inspiration and one additional branching choice, consumes 5 points of source mass from memory. 

Gain Insanity (-1) - Gain a certain number of Evilology branching points (increasing with the number of choices), add one point of inspiration and one additional branching choice, consume memory 10 source quality points. 

Restoration Matter/Energy (1) - Gain 10~25% branching progress in Energetics. 

Rift in the Vat (1) - Three random branches gain 10~30% branching progress. Two additional subjects gain full completion. 

 Fissure Monitor (1) - Cultivation gains 20~40% branching progress without distortion. 

§l§6§lSource: mcmod.cn,Author Harmless Cookies.
